title: Dress (rob azi)
description: predominantly brown dress with diamond patterned small orange dots; dot\'s center slightly raised from being tied; neck opening is circular with slit in front; two metal buttons at collar; sleeves are long and have a very wide cuff that ends with a tassel; maroon cloth with yellow polka dot pattern decorates part of neck opening
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
